name: My PhD on project X
description:
Care for your critters in this sandbox simulator, but how far will you go to complete your PhD?



This is a critter. Bask in its cuteness. Listen to it sing for you. Love it.  Kiss its little head.
Now it is time to care for them. They eat plants, have babies, and only die if they get too hungry. Should be easy, right?

Set plant number, critter number, and cannibalism at the start then watch your critters go. Plants slowly regrow over time. If the number of critters reaches 0 then the PhD ends.

Critters have a grub stage and an adult stage. Adults will pass each other and interact (small heart). If they like each other enough then they might have a baby (big heart).

What was that about being sponsored by a shady organisation? I'm sure it's nothing to worry about...
